de.weltraumschaf.juberblog.formatter

Class BaseFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.weltraumschaf.juberblog.formatter.BaseFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Formatter, HtmlFormatter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PostFormatter, SiteFormatter

    abstract class BaseFormatter
extends Object
implements HtmlFormatter
    Implements the base of all formatters. All formatters are a stack of: 
     +---------------+
 |    layout     |
 | +-----------+ |
 | |  content  | |
 | | +-------+ | |
 | | | input | | |
 | | +-------+ | |
 | +-----------+ |
 +---------------+
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter
